trans-unit.source: Specifies that a field can be missing from a serialization stream so that the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref> does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定该字段可以缺少从序列化流因此， <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter"> </xref>和<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter"></xref>不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This attribute allows you to specify that new fields in a serializable type (a type to which the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> is applied to) are ignored by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> or the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可指定新序列化的类型中的字段 (为类型<xref:System.SerializableAttribute>应用于)<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>或<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter></xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>忽略</xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This enables version-tolerant serialization of types created for older versions of an application that serializes data.
trans-unit.target: 这样类型为将数据序列化的应用程序的较旧版本创建的版本容错序列的化。

trans-unit.source: For example, when the formatters encounter a stream produced by a version that does not include the new fields, no exception is thrown, and the existing data on the older type is processed as normal.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当格式化程序遇到不包含新字段的版本所产生的流时，不引发任何异常，并正常处理较旧的类型上的现有数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.OptionalFieldAttribute"></xref> class.
This property is unused and is reserved.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是未使用，并且被保留。
